err.conf.unavailable_lang_code.en_GB: The requested language code ($req_code) is not available. Falling back to $fallback_code.

err.conf.unset_required.homeserver.en_GB: Could not get the URL of the homeserver. Please set the MSB_HS_URL environment variable.

err.conf.unset_required.user.en_GB: Could not get the username to log in as. Please set the MSB_USER environment variable.

err.conf.unset_required.pass.en_GB: Could not get the password to log in with. Please set the MSB_PASS environment variable.

err.conf.invalid.homeserver.en_GB: Failed to parse homeserver URL. The error was: $err

err.signal.register.followup.en_GB: Failed to register follow-up signal handler for signal $signal. The error was: $err

err.signal.register.initial.en_GB: Failed to register initial signal handler for signal $signal. The error was: $err

err.auth.login_fail.en_GB: Failed to authenticate to Matrix server `$hs_url` as `$username`. The error was: $err

err.auth.logout_fail.en_GB: Logging out failed. The error was: $err

err.auth.logout_tmp_unsupported.en_GB: Automatic logout is currently unsupported. You may need to manually logout the session with ID $device_id.

err.matrix.event_send.en_GB: Encountered error while sending event. The error was: $err

err.sync.crash.en_GB: Sync loop crashed. The error was: $err

warn.conf.unset.prefix.en_GB: The bot's prefix was not explicitly set so `$default` was used. To remove this warning, set the MSB_PREFIX environment variable.

info.auth.login_success.en_GB: Authenticated to Matrix server `$hs_url` as `$username` and got device ID `$device_id`

info.sync.start.en_GB: Starting sync loop and listening for commands via Matrix

info.command.recv.en_GB: Received command from $sender in room $room_id with contents: $cmdline
